issue.title: [CF 1313] Spinning crane kick
issue.body:
Hi. Is it possible due to monk's "Spinning Crane Kick" mechanics to set the condition which would show if i already got the stack from current mob or not? Looks like there is no intended tools but may be you could share some Lua condtion or implement smth in the future. Im sure im not the only one who may need it since there is no way to track it and that's confusing.


> Posted by CurseForge user Digitl | Imported from CurseForge issue #1313 | Raw

comments.body:
Uhh, it puts a debuff on your target called "Mark of the Crane". Did you even try to figure this out on your own?

If you want to track all of the ones that you have out, use an All-Unit buff/debuff icon.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
